name: Drifting Tanks
description:
A multiplayer turn based tank game, where the goal is to defeat the other person you are playing with. 2-4 players.

Controls :

Move : wasd / left stick, left trigger and right trigger.

Shoot : space / south button

Camera : arrows / right stick

Switch bullet : E / west button

Reset tank : R / east button

Exit : Escape (esc)
